I woke up yesterday morning, stretched my legs, reached over and fondled my wife's gorgeous ass, got out of bed.  Went into my kitchen and cooked a nice breakfast of scrambled eggs and hasbrowns, with a couple pieces of bacon.  

After eating my breakfast, I sat down at my computer chair, booted up Skyrim, and killed some stuff.

Then I went into the bathroom..  sat on the bowl, and took a MASSIVE ASSBLOWINGOUT SIZED SHIT.  As I lay there crying in the half fetal position.  I gingerly wiped my anus, stood up and looked at what had to be the biggest piece of shit I've EVER seen roll out of my brown crater.  

Then I watched 20 minutes of Red Dawn.. and I realized I had not even come CLOSE to the biggest shit ever taken.

Words cannot begin to describe how awful this movie is..

And fact that this is a remake of a 1984 movie that starred the likes of Patrick Swayze, C. Thomas Howell, Charlie Sheen and Jennifer Grey.

Why why why.
